TextView.android:text: Attested Death certificate \n (issued by Govt/Municipal corporation)\n FIR/MLC (Medico Legal Case Report)
Attested Post Mortem. Spot \n and/or Inquest Panchnama
Cancelled cheque with claimant/payee name\n printed on it (else supported by a passbook copy)\n or NEFT form verified by bank
Indemnity Cum Declaration Bond on \n Rs 100 Stamp Paper, to be filled by nominee
AML Documents [if claimed amount is >1Lakh]\n (2 passport size photos, one address and ID proof\n of the nominee as in C-KYC form)

Nominee Declaration Documents 
 (If nominee not mentioned in policy copy)
 Nominee proof of relationship with deceased/
 Legal Heir Certificate. No Objection Certificate
 from all other Legal heirs duly attested by Notary 
 on a stamp paper duly

Police final charge sheet or Court Final Order 
 (if case closed) ,Forensic Science Laboratory 
 (FSL)/ Histopathology/ Chemical analysis Report 
 If recommended in PM
Medical Cause of Death certificate issued \n by Hospital with supporting treatment
Medical Cause of Death certificate issued \n by Hospital with supporting treatment
IV photos along with Engine Chassis Number
Medical Cause of Death certificate issued \n by Hospital with supporting treatment
Reason for no FIR and NO PMR And Panchnama

Disability Certificate stating percentage 
 of disablement (issued by authorized
 medical officer/ civil surgeon of civil hospital / 
 govt. hospital of the district / units concerned)
Indemnity Cum Declaration Bond on Rs 100 Stamp Paper, to be filled by nominee

Hospital treatment papers essential
 of confirmation of the type and percentage
 of disability (like X-Ray reports,
 discharge summary, consultation notes)
Color Photograph of the injured reflecting disability
Photo ID proof of the injured
Cancelled cheque with payee name printed\n on it (else supported by a passbook copy)\n or NEFT form verified by bank

AML Documents [if claimed 
 amount is >1Lakh (2 passport size photos,
 one address and ID proof of the injured as in
 C-KYC form)]
